news.title: Police officer among four dead in shooting at New York City office building
news.summary: Authorities say Shane Devon Tamura travelled across the country from Las Vegas to open fire inside the skyscraper.

news.title: Starmer to hold emergency cabinet to discuss Gaza peace plan
news.summary: Ministers have been called back to Westminster on Tuesday to discuss peace plans and aid efforts for the territory.

news.summary: The event in London will begin along The Mall and end with a ceremony in front of  Buckingham Palace.

news.title: Chris Mason: Trump visit provides Starmer with invaluable access
news.summary: The PM's time with the president helped burnish a relationship as solid as it is improbable.

news.title: Lifeboat crew defends 'compassionate' migrant rescues
news.summary: It says it has saved the lives of 58 people crossing the Channel "in their most distressing times".

news.title: China offers parents $1,500 in bid to boost births
news.summary: The scheme is China's first nationwide subsidy of its kind as the government tries to tackle a looming demographic crisis.

news.title: The Papers: 'The lion ladies' and 'You can't fake that starvation'
news.summary: The Lionesses' triumphant European Championship win and Gaza aid dominate Tuesday's papers.

news.summary: The 73-year-old has become the first Colombian president to be convicted of a crime.

news.title: Watch: Nursing home residents rescued from China floods
news.summary: At least 30 people have been killed in floods that have inundated large parts of northeastern China.

news.title: Suspect in murder of woman and her two teenage children dies
news.summary: A service for Vanessa Whyte and her children, James and Sara Rutledge, will also be held in Maguiresbridge on Wednesday morning.
